title: Only 1 Label is being detected ,1 Image is being Detected for Sparsity Training
body:
## ‚ùîQuestion
Only 1 Label is being detected ,1 Image is being Detected for Sparsity Training even though paths r same for all the images ?

## Additional context
Hi ,
When I am performing sparsity Training using the  "https://github.com/tanluren/yolov3-channel-and-layer-pruning/ " which in turn  uses   " ultralytics/yolov3 " for dataset preparation .

So I followed  "https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data" for dataset Preparation .(PFA)
![DatasetImg1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71821730/103220610-ac2b7680-4946-11eb-9362-5910af5a9357.PNG)
![datasetImg2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71821730/103220612-ad5ca380-4946-11eb-8b36-6c4c05733797.PNG)

--------------------------------------------same way for Train also , it is not captured in the screenshot .



All the paths are correct as per the tutorial. That's y 1 label is being detected . I m attaching .data file along with train.txt and test.txt PFA 
[train_coco.txt](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/files/5747618/train_coco.txt)
[objcoco.zip](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/files/5747619/objcoco.zip)
[test_coco.txt](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/files/5747620/test_coco.txt)


However Sparsity Training is Happening after detecting 1 label 1 Image .

Command Used -  ! python train.py --cfg cfg/yolov4.cfg --data data/objcoco.data --weights /content/drive/MyDrive/Colab\ Notebooks/yolov4.weights --epochs 20 --batch-size 10 -sr --s 0.001 --prune 1


Issue : 

Namespace(accumulate=2, adam=False, arc='defaultpw', batch_size=10, bucket='', cache_images=False, cfg='cfg/yolov4.cfg', data='data/objcoco.data', device='', epochs=20, evolve=False, img_size=416, img_weights=False, multi_scale=False, name='', nosave=False, notest=False, prebias=False, prune=1, rect=False, resume=False, s=0.001, sr=True, t_cfg='', t_weights='', transfer=False, var=None, weights='/content/drive/MyDrive/Colab Notebooks/yolov4.weights')
